organizations: Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal’s raunchy rap in which he mocked former teammate Kobe Bryant is costing him another of his lawman badges. Bedford County Sheriff Mike Brown said Wednesday that he has asked O’Neal, a center for Phoenix, to return a badge he was given for his work with the Virginia county’s Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force. A sheriff in Arizona has also asked O’Neal to return a special deputy’s badge.
